examples: I'm very attached to my pets.

definitions.definition: Included as an attachment with a communication (especially an email or other electronic communication).
examples: Please see the attached file in my previous email.

definitions.definition: In a romantic or sexual relationship.
examples: As far as I know, he isn't attached , so I'm going to invite him out on a date.
I'm not ready to get attached , as I want to continue sleeping around.

definitions.definition: Broadly joined to a stem or stipe , but not decurrent .
examples: In this group of mushrooms, the attachment of the gills to the stipe ranges from attached to almost decurrent.

definitions.definition: Of a residential building, sharing walls with similar buildings on two, usually opposite, sides.

secondary_definitions: Included as an attachment with a communication (especially an email or other electronic communication).
In a romantic or sexual relationship.
( botany , mycology ) Broadly joined to a stem or stipe , but not decurrent .
Of a residential building, sharing walls with similar buildings on two, usually opposite, sides.
